resources.string: This is a demo app used to reproduce a SoundPool bug (Issue 58113) found in stock Android 4.3. To recreate the bug, click the button labeled \'Play\'. The expected result on Android 4.3 is that a sound will play once. If done on another version of Android, the sound should play continuously.\n\nAs a reminder, make sure your music volume level is set high enough to hear the sound.
